label: Tool Input: STIX 2.1 Bundle
description: Structured CTI ingestion format used by most threat intel platforms

label: Tool Input: PCAP File
description: Network packet capture used for protocol analysis or anomaly detection

label: Tool Input: JSON File
description: Generic structured input for configurations, logs, or indicators

label: Tool Input: CSV File
description: Tabular indicators, logs, or IOCs in a spreadsheet-compatible format

label: Tool Input: PDF Report
description: Narrative CTI or threat reports for parsing, summarizing, or entity extraction

label: Tool Input: TXT File
description: Unstructured logs or plaintext artifacts

label: Tool Output: STIX 2.1 Bundle
description: Enriched CTI output compatible with OpenCTI or MISP

label: Tool Output: PDF Summary
description: Formatted report of results, analytics, or emulation findings

label: Tool Output: JSON File
description: Structured output of enriched observables, configs, or logs

label: Tool Output: CSV Export
description: Human-readable structured report of tool results

label: Tool Output: PCAP File
description: Generated or filtered network captures for replay or analysis

label: Tool Output: TXT Log
description: Plain text logging of tool activity or scan results

label: Format: STIX 2.1
description: Structured Threat Intelligence format by OASIS used in CTI exchanges

label: Format: JSON
description: Standard structured data format for input/output between tools

label: Format: CSV
description: Comma-separated format used in logs, indicators, or observables

label: Format: PDF
description: Portable Document Format used for human-readable reports

label: Format: TXT
description: Raw plaintext format

label: Format: PCAP
description: Packet Capture file used for deep network inspection

label: Hosted: Local CLI
description: Runs as a command-line tool on analyst workstation or testbed

label: Hosted: Cloud Service
description: Accessible over the internet via secured portal or API

label: Hosted: Containerized (Docker)
description: Runs in a portable containerized environment

label: Hosted: Virtual Machine
description: Requires virtual appliance or VM image

label: Hosted: SaaS Platform
description: Subscription-based platform with hosted dashboard and services

label: Hosted: Web Service Application
description: Tool is deployed as a browser-accessible web service hosted internally or in the cloud

label: Hosted: Local Application Executable
description: Tool runs as a native GUI application installed on a local system

label: User Input: CLI Prompt
description: Tool requires user to provide input interactively via terminal

label: User Input: Form Fields (GUI)
description: Tool provides form fields for entering observables, filters, or parameters

label: User Input: Drag-and-Drop Upload
description: Allows analysts to upload artifacts via drag-and-drop (e.g., PCAPs, PDFs)

label: User Input: API Payload Configuration
description: User manually structures JSON/STIX payloads to submit to the tool

label: User Input: File Path or Directory Selection
description: Requires user to specify input file paths or scan directories

label: Interface: Web Dashboard
description: Browser-based interface for search, configuration, and results visualization

label: Interface: REST API
description: Tool exposes endpoints for integration with other systems

label: Interface: CLI Utility
description: Command-line driven interface for automation and batch use
